response.original_title: Zero Hour: Climate Change in China
response.overview: In the fight against climate change, China has set out to be carbon neutral by 2060.  Now, a new generation is taking up this goal in the face of environmental degradation, extreme weather events and the reality that they will be the ones affected most by climate inaction.  This documentary not only features students, but also some of the creative solutions to fighting climate change.
response.title: Zero Hour: Climate Change in China
